name: Box on the run
description:
The goal of BOTR is to find the box that stands out from the others. Inspired by the game where's Waldo, you have the chance to navigate in a 3D world and have a multitude of unknown objects to find. The level of difficulty will increase expodentially. Fasten your seat belt! The game will force you to develop your patience, work methods and observation skills. 

Are you ready for the challenge?

Features

Version 1.00 

•Personal record per level. 

• 28 levels to unlock 

• You can play with physics to pass the time!

• A tutorial that will allow everyone to play. 

• Several challenges

• Surprises

• A lot of swearing

Outofthebox Website: https://marchesseaultpasca.wixsite.com/ootb

Self-taught I have worked and still work to offer the best products according to my skills. Having a very atypical life path, I want to use my knowledge to allow you to live pleasant experiences. If you like my content and want to help me develop new titles and add content to already published projects, you can buy the games on this platform or donate via paypall or bitcoin/ETH.
